title: Ruling on covering the hands for women in Prayer (gloves) | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem -JAL
transcript: rashad from tunisia says what's the ruling on covering the hands for women in salat or is it permissible to cover the back of the hand the answer is if there are no men it is prohibited to cover the face or the hands she must not cover them in salat but if there are none men looking at her then she is obliged to do that
